name: Switzerland

typical_paths.label: Swiss distribution perimeter (informational)
bullets: Switzerland has distinct rules on distribution/offerings; professional vs retail segmentation is critical.
Treat Swiss coverage as partial until each distribution scenario is validated.

marketing_notes: Distribution into Switzerland can trigger additional requirements depending on investor classification and product.
Verify any rep/agent requirements and offering restrictions.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any cross-border marketing to Swiss investors.
